instructions: Go to alexa.amazon.com in your computer web browser. Log in to your Amazon Alexa account. Click on Settings . Echo voice web 1 Source: Jeramy Johnson / Android Central Scroll down and click on Voice Purchasing under Alexa Account . Echo voice web 2 Source: Jeramy Johnson / Android Central Click the toggle to enable your 4-Digit Voice Code to be required for voice purchases. Echo voice web 3 Source: Jeramy Johnson / Android Central

Open the Amazon Alexa app on your phone. Tap on the menu icon in the top left corner (3 lines). Tap on Settings . Tap on Account Settings . Echo voice purchasing 1 Echo voice purchasing 2 Echo voice purchasing 3 Source: Jeramy Johnson / Android Central and Jeramy Johnson / Android Central Tap on Voice Purchasing . Toggle on/off the Purchase by voice switch if you don't want anyone to be able to make voice purchase through your Echo devices. Toggle on/off Voice code if you want to control who has permission to voice purchasing through your Echo devices. If you decide to require a voice code for purchases, you will be asked to set or confirm a 4-digit PIN code . Echo voice purchasing 4 Echo voice purchasing 5 Echo voice purchasing 6 Source: Jeramy Johnson / Android Central You can also require a voice code only if Alexa doesn't recognize the speaker. Toggle Recognize Speakers to enable this feature (it will require you to have set up a voice profile with Alexa). Finally, you can enable or disable Kids Skills Purchasing by toggling on/off the respective switch, and/or by allowing Kids Skills Purchasing only with your approval. Echo voice purchasing 7 Echo voice purchasing 8 Source: Jeramy Johnson / Android Central

Go to playstation.com . Sign-in through the upper right hand corner of the page. Click on your profile image . PSN profile on desktop Source: Android Central Select Account Settings from the dropdown menu. Select Security on the left of the page. Click on Edit next to your password. Enter your current password and the new password you'd like as prompted. Change PSN password on desktop Source: Android Central Hit Save.
